page.title: 09Local Artists of Shalford
page.content: { Peter French}is a graphical designer. Most of his work is reproduced. Some of his drawings are used for postcards. It takes him half a day to do a postcard drawing and a few days to complete a large drawing.{ { { Ashley Bryant}has been painting all his life. He very recently gave up his full time job to become a professional water colour artist. He aims to do ten pictures a week but a picture with a lot of detail can take three twelve-hour days. An exhibition of his work was held at the {Finchingfield Guild Hall}in July 1985. He is soon to start organising and teaching local classes.
